name: K'IN/UW: THE LOST SONG CHRONICLES
description:
Story

Ux-lanque (made up character) is the little brother of Ixbalanqué and Hunahpú, both characters from Popol Vuh, story of creation of the Quiche-Mayan, and he must travel to the underworld (Xibalbá) to rescue his brothers from the evil lord bat that has captured them. If he wishes to save his brothers, he must go trough three different areas and collect all objects that once aided their brothers in their journey, to be able to defeat the enemy and free his brothers.  A mosquito, who once traveled with his brothers, will aid him in his journey giving him advice when needed.

Controls

  • Horizontal Movement -> A, D
  • Jumping -> SPACEBAR
  • Shoot -> LEFT MOUSE BUTTON
  • Dash -> LEFT SHIFT
  • Pause -> ESCAPE
  • Use Transporter -> E
